
// Processor  test code
// This code reads data from the leds, a 8 bit number, incremment it in 1, 
// and writes the result of the operation in the leds
// @M3lissaEG

// addi  X1, Xzr, #4
1001000100 000000000100 11111 00001
1001 0001 0000 0000 0001 0011 1110 0001
91 00 13 E1  s


// addi  X27, Xzr, #256
1001000100 000100000000 11111 11011
1001 0001 0000 0100 0000 0011 1111 1011
91 04 03 fb

//ldur X19, [X27, #0]
11111000010 00000000000 11011 10011
1111 1000 0100 0000 0000 0011 0111 0011
f8 40 03 73

// addi X19, X19, #1
1001000100 000000000001 10011 10011
1001 0001 0000 0000 0000 0110 0111 0011
91 00 06 73

//stur x19, [X27, #0]
11111000000 00000000000 11011 10011
1111 1000 0000 0000 0000 0011 0111 0011
f8 00 03 73

91 02 03 fb
f8 40 03 73
91 00 03 fb
f8 00 03 73
